participant_1.background:
I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood.
I like to eat soft foods that are easy to digest when I am confined to my bed.
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
i work as a trauma surgeon.
my cat s name is leroy jenkins.

participant_2.background:
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
I would brag about my violin skills to my friends if I was famous.
i am a very tall woman.
I watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team.
I am passionate about capturing the beauty of the world around me, even when I'm not feeling well.

content.text: Hey! That sounds like a challenging job! What do you like the most about it?
I like the feeling of helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's great! What's a typical day like for you?
I wake up early, check my emails and patients' charts, and head to the hospital. I spend most of my day in surgery, and then I usually have some follow-up appointments in the afternoon.
That sounds like a busy schedule! Do you have any hobbies?
I collect children's books and toys to remember my childhood, and I like to watch football with my husband and discuss our fantasy team.
That's cool! I'm also a big fan of football. Do you have any pets?
I have a cat named Leroy Jenkins. He's a big part of my family.
Aww, cats are the best! I'm a big fan of animals in general.
Me too! I think they're so cute and cuddly.
I'm a very tall woman, so finding clothes that fit me can be a challenge.
I can imagine! I'm on the shorter side, so I can usually find clothes that fit me off the rack.
I'm glad! I have to do a lot of shopping online.
I do a lot of that too. I'm not always sure what size I am, so I like to be able to try things on before I buy them.
Me too! That way I can make sure they fit right.
